## CreateTaskFromTaskFormRequest type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CreateTaskFromTaskFormRequest = {
    answers?: Array<{
        questionId?: string;
        name?: string;
        status?: string;
        assigneesIds?: Array<string>;
        listIds?: Array<string>;
        description?: string;
        field?: {
            fieldTemplateId: string;
            value?: string;
            date?: string;
            labels?: Array<string>;
            linkedTasks?: Array<{
                id?: string;
                index?: number;
            }>;
        };
    }>;
};
```
